website_summaries.verdict: Low price for a mini PC that has enough power out of the box to run Windows 10.
pros: Ships with surprisingly strong integrated graphics that can support two 4K monitors simultaneously
Does not require a fan, so it runs quietly
Storage capacity is easy to expand thanks to the SD memory card slot
cons: Only includes a Celeron CPU, so it doesn’t have the processing power of some other models

customer_reviews.title: very slow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. it's very slow and if you plan on using it wireless it's even slower, the graphics are poor I'm sure if you used it very much it would melt down as it does not have a cooling fan
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and works well. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Little skeptical based on the price and size but it is actually a solid little machine. Started up no problem and started booting windows, asking the standard first time bootup questions. I plan on making a smart mirror for our kitchen so this is perfect! All I want it to do is show a dashboard and youtube videos and be able to be discretely stashed away. Right now to set it up I have it plugged into my tv with an HDMI and using a wireless mouse and keyboard. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ersack5142

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact pc
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a raspberry pi that was a bit too slow for my needs over time. I wanted something small and compact but with a little more power and low power consumption. I disregarded using windows and also installed an internal m.2 SSD so I can install Ubuntu. Works like a charm. Much more responsive and 4K to boot.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, great speed, and reliability.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how easy it was to set up. I connected it to my computer since I’m not a fan of the smart functions. It looks great, quality if great, and it works fast over WiFi. Reading the reviews that was one of my fears. But I have not had any issues streaming videos. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Adonis Veliz

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot when you use it for work
customer_reviews.text: What I didn't like about it is, I need to teach it to do what I want it to do. Its a no brainer and easy to use for browsing internet and emailing and stuff basic stuffs... some of the microsoft word documents or excel it didn't come with, need to download and not the latest word or excel
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW! Fantastic Mini PC
customer_reviews.text: This mini pc is a pleasure to work with. Fast, reliable, installed all Windows updates without a hitch. Plays YouTube in HD like a dream, and even though it is fanless did not get hot after several hours of use. So glad I picked this one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: alegoje

customer_reviews.title: No speaker/ not good for gaming
customer_reviews.text: It does not have a build in speaker and it is not good for gaming
customer_reviews.author: How I feel

customer_reviews.title: Best computer for dummies! Just plug in stuff.
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect in every way. More than I could have hoped for! It does everything it says. Works instantly with all monitors, even wireless printers in a snap! Connects with terminal at work from my home better than my new more costly laptop. I couldn't be more pleased with this easy inexpensive solution! I want to buy another to connect with my bedroom TV.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: A great fanless mini PC.
customer_reviews.text: A great fanless mini PC. I use it for a web browser, NetFlix, and Comcast xfinty.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Richardson

customer_reviews.title: A lot more in that box than you think
customer_reviews.text: Really same works really well. We dont do to many games on it but so far has done very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very long startup
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to start up! Once it’s up, it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen muncy

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described
customer_reviews.text: This mini computer meets or exceeds our expectations . The physical size , number of ports / connections are great & Windows 10 was easy to set up . My wife uses it for general e-mails , shopping , news & Zoom meetings . Great buy !!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my smaller tv that isn’t a smart tv and it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Just this girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Streaming box
customer_reviews.text: This mini PC does everything I want and does it noiselessly. It replaced an Android box that wouldn't send audio over html with the HBOMax app. I use a Logitech K400r wireless keyboard and Chrome to stream services my 4k Smart TV and Dish Hopper 3 either don't have or are too clumsy to search via remotes. Boots quickly, thanks to the SSD. Note; I did need to upgrade my HDMI cable to improve resolution. So, if your picture is less than satisfactory, look into that.
customer_reviews.author: SoundGuyDave

customer_reviews.title: Not quite enough for Zoom. This is really a 1.1Ghz processor.
customer_reviews.text: The CPU and GPU max out with the display set to 4K when running Zoom. Scaling back to 1080p display results in GPU closer to 50% when running Zoom. CPU is still maxed out and audio clips. This CPU is 1.1Ghz with burst to 2.6. The marketing is a little misleading. I am now going to replace this with a true 2Ghz dual core machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bjorn Kilburn

customer_reviews.title: Great little PC
customer_reviews.text: I love this little PC. You can turn any flat screen TV (if it has an open HDMI connection) into a computer. Just add a wireless keyboard/mouse. It came with Windows 10 Pro 1903 but updated to 1909 without a problem. I installed and used Microsoft Office for a while, worked great. I added a 128GB SD card for more data storage. I used it for an Emby server and to play music on my Bluetooth enabled stereo. Great for streaming TV. It will work headless and WOL works when wired. So many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Died within hours
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk, died within hours of switching in,I don't want to discuss the quality of his products. At least I think it is very BAD! Very poor texture and workmanship. What surprised me was that his product manual did not help me how to use the product, but told me to go to other websites. There will be a higher discount, I am surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: 🤯🤯DOESN'T BOOT🤯🤯
customer_reviews.text: The mini pc doesn't start and most of the time it doesn't boot at all.This seller selling faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Shrilly

product_meta.title: Mini PC Fanless Intel Celeron N4000 (up to 2.6GHz) 4GB DDR/64GB eMMC Mini Desktop Computer Windows 10 HDMI 2.0and VGA Port 2.4/5.8G WiFi BT4.2 3xUSB3.0 Support Linux,NGFF 2242 SSD Auto Power On
feature_bullets: 【Stable&Faster Performance】Support Windows 10 and support Ubuntu,built-in 4GB DDR4 /64GB eMMC, Intel Celeron Processor N4000,up to 2.60GHz,running faster and more stable.

【Portable and Silent】 Equipped with a mounting bracket can be easily fixed to the back of the monitor and space saving.The fanless design with 6w SDP come trues the electricity bills saving and zero noise.

【Dual screen HD display】 Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 600 supports 2x monitors 4K@60Hz using HDMI and VGA ports. It’s ideal for multitasking, home theater, office working, digital Security and surveillance, digital signage, media center,conference room etc.

【Full Function】 Support 2.4G/5.8G Band WiFi 4.2 and HDMI 2.0 &VGA ports for dual screen.With 3x usb 3.0 ports and SD card slot,M.2 2242 NGFF SSD port,it can expand the storage easily and works like as a desktop computer.
【Package】3x USB 3.0 ports,1x RJ45,1x HDMI,1x VGA,1x mounting bracket,1x power adapter and 1x HDMI cable.
